name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Super Special Party Time! ３Dお披露目！#Kiara3DParty [q3Z9dPHKS3Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Kiara continues her merchandise promotion, showing a thermo bottle and case set.
Kiara announces her first 'Hologra' episode coming tomorrow at 6 PM JST.
Kiara mentions Mori Calliope's 3D debut tomorrow, calling it 'TakaMori weekend'.
Kiara prepares to move to the main Hololive English stage for the final song.
A black and white VTR shows Kiara 'cleaning' (goofing off) in the KFP restaurant.
Final MC section on the main Hololive English stage. Kiara thanks her fans.
Kiara performs her original song 'DO U'.

subtitles.original: ...special 3D merchandise for this occasion.
subtitles.english: ...special 3D merchandise for this occasion.

subtitles.original: And...
subtitles.english: And...

subtitles.original: ...there's something else that I want to tell you about.
subtitles.english: ...there's something else that I want to tell you about.

subtitles.original: Tomorrow!
subtitles.english: Tomorrow!

subtitles.original: Tomorrow!
subtitles.english: Tomorrow!

subtitles.original: Yes, tomorrow at 6 PM JST...
subtitles.english: Yes, tomorrow at 6 PM JST...

subtitles.original: ...my very first Hologra is coming out!
subtitles.english: ...my very first Hologra is coming out!

subtitles.original: 明日6時に出ます！
subtitles.english: It's coming out at 6:00 tomorrow!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: 夜、夜の6時です。
subtitles.english: In the evening, 6 PM.

subtitles.original: Well, and of course tomorrow...
subtitles.english: Well, and of course tomorrow...

subtitles.original: ...is also the 3D debut of Calliope Mori.
subtitles.english: ...is also the 3D debut of Calliope Mori.

subtitles.original: So go check her out, okay?
subtitles.english: So go check her out, okay?

subtitles.original: It's TakaMori weekend! Yay!
subtitles.english: It's TakaMori weekend! Yay!

subtitles.original: So, besides that...
subtitles.english: So, besides that...

subtitles.original: ...I have one more song for you guys.
subtitles.english: ...I have one more song for you guys.

subtitles.original: But we— I think we should change location.
subtitles.english: But we— I think we should change location.

subtitles.original: Is that okay?
subtitles.english: Is that okay?

subtitles.original: Change! Change!
subtitles.english: Change! Change!

subtitles.original: Alright, there's one more stage I haven't shown you guys yet...
subtitles.english: Alright, there's one more stage I haven't shown you guys yet...

subtitles.original: ...which is the big Hololive English stage!
subtitles.english: ...which is the big Hololive English stage!

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Ah, ah... That video!
subtitles.english: Ah, ah... That video!

subtitles.original: I did not give the permission to show that video!
subtitles.english: I did not give the permission to show that video!

subtitles.original: Why did you show that video?! Ahh!
subtitles.english: Why did you show that video?! Ahh!

subtitles.original: I wasn't slacking, I was practicing!
subtitles.english: I wasn't slacking, I was practicing!

subtitles.original: Well, I am here on this beautiful EN stage right now...
subtitles.english: Well, I am here on this beautiful EN stage right now...

subtitles.original: ...to perform one last song!
subtitles.english: ...to perform one last song!

subtitles.original: But before that, I want to say thank you guys so much...
subtitles.english: But before that, I want to say thank you guys so much...

subtitles.original: ...for waiting for such a long time.
subtitles.english: ...for waiting for such a long time.

subtitles.original: Two and a half years, I think, roughly...
subtitles.english: Two and a half years, I think, roughly...

subtitles.original: ...until we got to this point, which is unusually long.
subtitles.english: ...until we got to this point, which is unusually long.

subtitles.original: But yeah, we all were patient...
subtitles.english: But yeah, we all were patient...

subtitles.original: ...and I think it was worth it.
subtitles.english: ...and I think it was worth it.

subtitles.original: I hope so! Was it worth it?
subtitles.english: I hope so! Was it worth it?

subtitles.original: Well, I practiced really hard for this day.
subtitles.english: Well, I practiced really hard for this day.

subtitles.original: And I tried really hard to fix my throat for this day.
subtitles.english: And I tried really hard to fix my throat for this day.

subtitles.original: So I hope you guys enjoyed it.
subtitles.english: So I hope you guys enjoyed it.

subtitles.original: It was a very special day for me.
subtitles.english: It was a very special day for me.

subtitles.original: I was really nervous...
subtitles.english: I was really nervous...

subtitles.original: ...but I hope I could show you all the beautiful parts...
subtitles.english: ...but I hope I could show you all the beautiful parts...

subtitles.original: ...all the good things about Takanashi Kiara!
subtitles.english: ...all the good things about Takanashi Kiara!

subtitles.original: Yeah, let's do more in the future, okay?
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's do more in the future, okay?

subtitles.original: Okay.
subtitles.english: Okay.

subtitles.original: So with that, the last song...
subtitles.english: So with that, the last song...
